Listening.Description: In the Listening test, you will be asked to demonstrate how well you understand spoken English. The entire Listening test will last approximately 45 minutes. There are four parts, and directions are given for each part. You must mark your answers on the separate answer sheet. Do not write your answers in your test book.

Part-list.Part: Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear four statements about a picture in your test book. When you hear the statements, you must select the one statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Then find the number of the question on your answer sheet and mark your answer. The statements will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

Directions: You will hear a question or statement and three responses spoken in English. They will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time. Select the best response to the question or statement and mark the letter (A), (B), or (C) on your answer sheet.

Directions: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

Directions: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

Reading.Description: In the Reading test, you will read a variety of texts and answer several different types of reading comprehension questions. The entire Reading test will last 75 minutes. There are three parts, and directions are given for each part. You are encouraged to answer as many questions as possible within the time allowed.

Part-list.Part: Directions: A word or phrase is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Directions: Read the texts that follow. A word or phrase is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Directions: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magazine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C), or (D) on your answer sheet.

Question.content: Register early if you would like to attend next Tuesday’s ------- on project management.
Paul Brown resigned last Monday from his position as ------- executive of the company.
The financial audit of Soft Peach Software ------- completed on Wednesday by a certified accounting firm.
The organizers of the trip reminded participants to ------- at the steps of the city hall at 2:00 P.M.
------- is no better season than winter to begin training at Silver’s Fitness Center.
The recent worldwide increase in oil prices has led to a ------- demand for electric vehicles.
Maria Vásquez has a wide range of experience, ------- worked in technical, production, and marketing positions.
Tickets will not be redeemable for cash or credit at any time, ------- will they be replaced if lost or stolen.
Author Ken Yabuki wrote a magazine article based on -------- recent visit to Iceland.
To ------- the Adele's Apparel store that is nearest to you, select your state or country from the pull-down menu.
The ink cartridge is designed for the SZ2000 laser printer -------- should not be used with any other model.
Lonan Imports will work -------- with any distributor to fullfill a customer request.
Products made by Izmir Vitamins are designed to promote --------- and well-being.
-------- graduating from Laccord University, Jing Xiong worked for Osiris Financial Service.
Gyeong Designs recently changed its marketing strategy to target hotel and restaurant -------
Ulrich Electronics will provide free ------- of any entertainment system purchased by June 30.
Jane Turngate was elected chairperson of ther board of directors at Stellmann Corporation by a ------- margin
The Keenview television is ------- selling well, even though the advertising campaign just started.
Today, Wichner Industries announced that it ------- opening an office in Kuala Lumpur to coordinate its overseas operations.
This is a -------- to renew your Chamber of Business membership, which expires on August 30.
Grove Canoes' price may ------- vary depending on changes in the cost of raw materials.

Choices.A: Let me explain our plans for on-site staff training.
Choices.B: We hope that you will strongly consider joining us.
Choices.C: Today's training session will be postponed until Monday.
Choices.D: This is the first in a series of such lectures.

Choices.question: What is the purpose of this advertisement?
Choices.A: To announce a change in business hours
Choices.B: To advertise a business for sale
Choices.C: To encourage diners to eat early

Choices.question: What will customers receive if they spend more than $10?
What will happen on June 16?
Choices.A: A new owner will take over the business.

Choices.question: What is the article mainly about?
Choices.C: Ways for companies to increase profits
Choices.D: How companies try to adapt to new conditions

Choices.question: The word “manage” in paragraph 1, line 6, is closest in meaning to
According to the article, why do so many attempts to change fail?
Choices.A: Soft change and hard change are different.
Choices.B: Executives are interested only in profits.
Choices.C: The best methods are often not clear.

Choices.question: What is soft change based on?
Why was the meeting held?
Choices.C: To discuss work on a project

Choices.question: Who would probably be the best person at Optimum to answer technology questions?
What is the main purpose of Mr. Ahmed’s e-mail to Ms. Morandi?
Choices.A: To request a meeting with the engineering department
Choices.C: To follow up on a meeting with Advantage
Choices.D: To explain how Optimum has adapted its software

Choices.question: What service will Peter Bodell’s department provide?
What will happen in the week of November 26?
Choices.A: Peter Bodell will make a presentation.
Choices.B: Optimum and Advantage will meet again.
Choices.D: Training in the new software will occur.
